contextId.information: "It was like all the living creatures in the sea were divided into three groups, and all of the creatures in one of those groups died." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
contextId.quote: a third of the living creatures in the sea died

contextId.information: "One third of the people." See how you translated "A third" in [[:en:bible:notes:rev:08:06|8:7]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
"One third." See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:rev:08:06|8:7]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_fraction]])
